snippet: ABRAMSON--Richard S. The Washington Institute extends its deepest condolences to the family of our beloved president, Richard S. Abramson, on his passing at age 70. A longstanding Institute officer, Richard is remembered by those whose lives he touched as a friend, partner, mentor, and inspirational leader. In life and in death, he was fearless, facing great challenges with remarkable courage, boundless energy and infectious good humor. May his memory be for a true and lasting blessing. Martin J. Gross, Chairman Robert B. Satloff, Executive Director 1/3
